Name: anal fistula
Definition: An anus disease characterized by is an abnormal connection between the epithelialised surface of the anal canal and the perianal skin.

Name: ulcer of anus and rectum
Definition: A congenital hypoplastic anemia characterized by progressive pancytopenia with bone marrow failure

Name: obsolete acute suppurative otitis media with tympanic membrane intact
Definition: A purulent acute otitis media with no perforation of the tympanic membrane.
Synonym: acute suppurative otitis media without spontaneous rupture of ear drum (disorder)

Name: proctitis
Definition: A rectal disease that involves inflammation of the rectal mucosa

Name: anus disease
Definition: A rectal disease that involves inflammation of the rectal mucosa

Name: obsolete synovitis and tenosynovitis
Definition: A rectal disease that involves inflammation of the rectal mucosa

Name: rectal prolapse
Definition: An abdominal tuberculosis that results_in formation of granulomas or abscesses located_in spleen.
